properties.name: Block Isalnd, what a great place to spend a summer.
properties.description: Posted by BrigittesmBlock Island, RIWorking and being on my own for the first time, at about 20 years of age. What a great time. The Block will always be a favorite place to return to.

properties.name: Camp Med-o-lark, Washington, ME
properties.description: Posted by BrigittesmWashington. MEI worked at this creative arts camp for 2 summers and developed their windsurfing program. It was a great experience.

properties.name: Formative Years 3-11
properties.description: Posted by BrigittesmBremen, Germany

properties.name: IDC (Intentional Democratic Community)
properties.description: Posted by BrigittesmIDC, UConn, Storrs, CTIDC (Intentional Democratic Community) an on campus commune which existed from 1972 to 1983 (RIp, killed by the Reagan years). I met most of my friends for life there, or through people from there.

properties.name: Simmons Graduate School off Social Work
properties.description: Posted by Brigittesm Simmons Graduate School of Social Work, Boston, MABack in the 80s the school was on Commonwealth Avenue, in a Brownstone. I got an excellent clinical social work and family therapy education there.

properties.name: The Vineyard, MA
properties.description: Posted by Brigittesm"The Vineyard", MAMy home away from home. Some of my dear friends live here and it is a wonderful place to be with them.

properties.name: The area in England where I went as a teenager for vacations to learn better English
properties.description: Posted by BrigittesmBournemouth, England

properties.name: The middle years and now the family home
properties.description: Posted by Brigittesm Iserlohn, GermanyThis is where I lived from ages 11 to 17, later my parents returned and continue to live there.

properties.name: This is the location of my family heritage.  We are Franconian and love little sausages and pretzels.

properties.name: Where I was hospitalized and recovered from a near fatal infection with bacterial menigitis
properties.description: Posted by BrigittesmHagen, GermanyThe hospital in Hagen is where I got a new lease on life.

properties.name: Williams high school, where I learned enough English in 1978/79 to go on to college
properties.description: Posted by Brigittesm Williams Preperatory Institute, New London, CTWhat a great place to be welcomed to a new country and culture.

properties.name: Working and living in Cambridge, MA
properties.description: Posted by BrigittesmCambridge, MA02138, the zip code for central Cambridge, is described as the most opinionated zip code in America. Cambridge IS a cool place to live and work. I love it here.
